alert.note: Alert for McCreary (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 6:53PM EDT until July 05 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McCreary County in south central Kentucky... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 652 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Co-Operative, or 9 miles northwest of Oneida, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern McCreary County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
